title: [求助] 1.7.10砍树mod
author: aiyun5
txt_content:
装了砍树mod后用斧子砍树反而比用手撸慢多了，怎么办不要说改 # THIS OPTION IS IGNORED WHEN treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed=false [range: 0.01 ~ 1.0, default: 0.256]
        S:breakSpeedModifier=1.0根本没有用啊，1.0还是很慢。再下也没有好用的，如果有合适的或者能用的1.7.10砍树mod可以发一下蓝链吗  顺便求1.8懒人包附带forge和忘却的旋律启动器别的地方下的很多用不了其他的mod我自己下就可以了如果还有需求我再补充。。。 谢谢！

replies.author: guizy
replies.txt_content:
guizy 发表于 2015-3-15 12:58
还要把treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed改成false
只改breakSpeedModifier不够的
是这样的：

break_speed_settings {
        # [Global, PerTree] When using an item that can chop trees, the break speed will by multiplied by this value
        # THIS OPTION IS IGNORED WHEN treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed=true [range: 0.01 ~ 1.0, default: 0.256]
        S:breakSpeedModifier=1.0

        # [Global] When true, the log break speed is equal to original break speed / (tree height * <treeHeightModifier>)
        # When false, the original break speed is multiplied by the breakSpeedModifier value [default: true]
        B:treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed=false

replies.author: guizy
replies.txt_content: 把你的配置文件treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed一栏改成false啊

replies.author: aiyun5
replies.txt_content:
guizy 发表于 2015-3-15 12:55
把你的配置文件treeHeightDecidesBreakSpeed一栏改成false啊
不是改了吗，买看到？
